topic.title: Does anyone knows any good pay to hire hacking website ?
topic.body: Since Dark0de is down, do you know some other place ?

1569615886_1Cht2qsdTvLYZq12erudxjk3W68p7.body: Frankly it was just to prove a point to a friend, that "No, it is not as easy as you think to hack into someone's facebook account and the easier things would involve social engineering. And even if someone had a miracle backdoor, it would most likely cost a shit ton money" Anyway thanks for the heads-up captain, it's always nice having someone take of their time answering a question, as silly as it is ;) Have a nice day/evening/morning/night

1569227990_1DYjydooxz1SvF5Dhg9hqKdoYF32t.body: Exterminatroll. (But seriously, if you really think that, and actually "made an AI", I hope it will be intelligent enough to suggest you just kill yourself ;)
